response.original_title: The Beatles’ “Magical Mystery Tour” DTS-HD MA
response.overview: Immerse yourself in the vibrant sound of The Beatles’ “Magical Mystery Tour,” now available in DTS-HD Master Audio 7.1 Surround mix on Blu-ray. Released in 1967, this album serves as the soundtrack to their whimsical television film and features a mix of beloved classics and new tracks. Iconic songs like “Magical Mystery Tour,” “The Fool on the Hill,” and “I Am the Walrus” are complemented by hits such as “Strawberry Fields Forever” and "Penny Lane".  With DTS-HD MA Surround, every note and harmony is delivered with stunning precision, enveloping you in a rich, multi-dimensional audio experience. The high-definition audio format preserves the intricate arrangements and pioneering recording techniques, offering an immersive listening experience for audiophiles and Beatles fans alike.  A Psychedelic Journey! Rediscover “Magical Mystery Tour” and embark on a sonic voyage through the album that continues to enchant listeners.
response.title: The Beatles’ “Magical Mystery Tour” DTS-HD MA
